EmailTemplate.name: 201901_Global_Emails_FlightBagPro_BetaLaunch_mih.201901_Global_OpenBeta_FlightBa
EmailTemplate.subject: Start your new GoDirect Flight Planning Experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirectFlight_Beta.html]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Are you ready to test the new flight planning experience from Honeywell GoDirect? Click HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirectFlight_Beta.html]]> to start now!
We’ve completely overhauled your flight planning experience with a next-generation website and refreshed electronic flight bag app GoDirect Flight Bag Pro.
In the coming weeks here are some of the benefits you will see:
- The use of flight management system (FMS) algorithm’s in conjunction with original equipment manufacturer (OEM) performance data for more accurate flight planning performance calculations.
- 4D flight planning optimization which considers time when creating a route.
- More Eurocontrol flight plans cleared as filed using our new B2B connection.
- Improved efficiency with route overlays, mapping and tracking to plan routes that match your goals.
- Saved time with faster speeds when computing a flight plan.
GET STARTED <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirectFlight_Beta.html]]>
